name: Melcor Real Estate Investment Trust 5.1% Convertible Unsecured Subordinated Debentures
longDescription: Melcor Real Estate Investment Trust is an open-ended real estate investment trust. The company is engaged in acquiring, owning, and managing offices, retail and industrial properties in select target markets in Western Canada. Its objective is to provide stable and growing monthly cash distributions to unitholders by acquiring high-quality properties and diversifying its portfolio.
